result.eng: Czech beer is the best in the world.

result.eng: The less money they have the better.

result.eng: The more words you use the better.

result.eng: The bigger it is the better.

result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad é is ea is fearrThe bigger it is the better.

result.eng: We prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.

result.html: Is fearr liom tae láidirI prefer strong tea.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr liom tae láidirI prefer strong tea.

result.eng: I hate camping, I prefer hotels.

result.eng: I am better now but I have a pain at times.

result.ga: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearr

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht

result.eng: I get on better with my father than with my mother.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh

result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: Voters prefer candidates who already have power.
